>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}/plaid/link_token"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a Plaid Link token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"account_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"legal_name":{"type":"string"},"email_address":{"type":"string"},"phone_number":{"type":"string"},"date_of_birth":{"type":"string","format":"date"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Link token created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"link_token":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
